extDescription.message: Premium WA Bulk Message Sender - Send Whatsapp Messages, Attachments, Personalized Message | Software | Marketing | WAMessager

numberPlaceholder.message: Add Numbers with country code Eg 91933333333 seprated by commas + Enter

numberPlaceholderDisabled.message: delete excel sheet first in order to enter numbers manually

downloadGroupHeadingText.message: Download Your Groups/ Labels/ Chats Contacts

allChatsText.message: Export All contacts info from chatlist

unsavedChatsText.message: Export Unsaved contacts info from chatlist

msgOverflowText.message: Don't send more than 50 messages on first day

errortext.message: Message text should not be empty

getPremiumHeading.message: These are the features you can enjoy

getPremium1.message: Send unlimited WhatsApp messages to your customers.

getPremium2.message: Download unlimited WhatsApp Group Contacts in an excel file.

getPremium3.message: Send personalized messages to your customers by uploading an excel file and selecting customization on wamessager.

getPremium4.message: Give unsubscribe option to your customers, so that they don't report you as spam and prevent your number from getting banned by WhatsApp

getPremium5.message: Send image, video, audio, file attachments.

getPremium6.message: Set time delay between each message to lower blocking chances.

getPremium7.message: Download Delivery Reports for better analytics of your Whatsapp campaigns.

getPremium8.message: Premium Customer support over whatsapp, email and google meet.

noteamMember.message: Upgrade plan to add team members

uploadExcelDisabledLabel.message: Delete numbers from below to upload excel sheet

firstMessageText.message: Let's start by sending your first message

firstMessageReadyText.message: You're ready to send your first message

onboardingMessage.message:
Hi, *I'm excited to use WAM and boost my business*, and unlike other extensions WAM has best in class features, quick customer support and most affordable pricing.
With Wam I can:
Send Personalized Messages
Send Clickable Links eg 
Send up to 7 attachments with caption
Connect with my contacts easily
Get 24 X 7 quick support here

onboardingSendIntro.message: Click here to get started and send your business on autopilot

syncMessageNote.message: (We require this to serve you better)

timeGapText.message: Send each message with a time gap of

timeGapRandomText.message: Send each message with a time gap of Random seconds

addTeamMemberNote.message: Add your team members so that they can use WAMessager Premium too

addTeamMemberPhonePlaceholder.message: Team Phone Number ( Add country code without any + or () ) eg: 918297386514

iziToastMsgLimitWarningMsg.message: Don't send more than $msgLimit$ messages on first day. Are you sure you want to continue?

iziToastErrMsgLeftMsg.message: You have $msgLimit$ messages left in your current plan. Please add upto $msgLimit$ contacts

iziToastErrMsgFinishedMsg.message: Thank You for using WAMessager, but it seems your $msg_limit$ FREE messages are finished. Please upgrade to continue using WAMessager.

iziToastMemberAlreadyPresentWarningMsg.message: Member can only be added once

iziToastAddNamePhoneWarningMsg.message: Name and Phone Number cannot be empty

iziToastUpgradeInfoMsg.message:
Thank You for using WAMessager, you can send up to $msg_limit$ message per day in Free Plan, to send more kindly upgrade your plan.
Ping us on WhatsApp $supportNumber$ to get 5% Discount Coupon Code

blurAllMessageToggleTextTitle.message: Blurs all messages in the chat.

blurLastMesssageToggleTextTitle.message: Blurs all message previews on the left.

blurMediaPreviewToggleTextTitle.message: Blurs all images, videos, stickers, ... in separation from the text.

blurMediaGallaryToggleTextTitle.message: Blurs all small preview icons of images, videos, ... while viewing an image, video, ...

blurTextInputToggleTextTitle.message: Makes the color in your input field lighter to make it hard to read.

noTransitionDelayToggleTextTitle.message: Allows you to turn off the delay before revealing an item on hover.

unblurAllToggleTextTitle.message: Unblurs all when you hover over the WhatsApp Web app.

iziToastReviewTitle.message: Review Us! It'd really help us reach more people üòÉüôè

iziToastReviewMessage.message: This is an affordable extension developed by the WAMessager Team to help businesses send WhatsApp messages to their customers, so that you don't have to buy other expensive extensions. Please show your support by rating us on the Chrome Store.

iziToastReviewMessageOffer.message:
Offer: Extend your trial by 1 week by reviewing us, send screenshot over WhatsApp to avail the offer.
Note: Valid 1 time per number

attachmentNote.message: Note: You can add upto 7 files, caption allowed only in images and videos

file_input_help.message: Size Limit: 16MB, Select 1 File at a time

fileSizeAlert.message:
$fileName$ size is too large, [ file size: $fileSize$ MB]. 
Maximum size allowed: 16MB

fileDuplicateAlert.message: $fileName$ file already selected. Please choose a different file

fileEmptyAlert.message: Choose a file first to submit attachment

addTimeStamp_optionText.message: Add Time Stamp (Important don't uncheck: this will reduce number banning chances)
